name: Seek Magician
description:
A classic RPG inspired by Space Funeral with creatures I'd like to hang out with in places I'd like to hang out at!                               

Pax goes on a  journey to seek magicians and learn wizardry from them in order to become the best magician!

On his journey he must face skeletons, land fish, dread minions, mystery birds, grimy caves, treasure critters, japes, real plastic dinos, mystic squids and many other things.

Seek Magician is a fairly short game (3 to 4 hours) mainly featuring vintage electronica and easy listening music.

On your journey you can do many activities such as fishing, bug catching, treasure hunting, drinking from puddles, swimming, hiking, brawling, dungeon crawling, dreaming, hanging out and playing arcade games!
